name: Worker
comment:
Start Elm applications without a view

@docs workerWithFlags, worker, beginnerWorker

values.name: beginnerWorker
values.comment: Start a worker program with just a model a simpler update function
values.type: (model -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg) -> { model : model, update : msg -> model -> model } -> Platform.Program Basics.Never

values.name: worker
values.type: (model -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg) -> { init : ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ) , update : msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ) , subscriptions : model -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg } -> Platform.Program Basics.Never

values.name: workerWithFlags
values.type: (model -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg) -> { init : flags -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ) , update : msg -> model -> ( model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg ) , subscriptions : model -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg } -> Platform.Program flags
